docs.text: kirk douglas is one of those rare american actors who can say more with a simple glance than most can say with pages of dialogue .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: all he has to do is look at someone with a raised eyebrow , and you instantly know what he's thinking .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: " detective story " features one of kirk douglas's finest performances .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he stars as a new york detective that has his whole world fall apart in one night .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the film is based on a play , and this is quite evident , as most of the movie takes place in the one-room flat that the detective's work in .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the film opens with the douglas character getting ready to go home to his wife , but through a series of events , he never quite makes it there .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the bulk of the movie follows the case of a man named schneider , a surgeon who routinely performs abortions with a high fatality rate .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: however , this schneider character has a connection in the past of douglas's wife ; a connection douglas himself is not aware of .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: many secrets are revealed in the last half hour of this film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: secrets i would not dream of giving away .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: with a name like " detective story " , one would assume the film would resemble an episode of " nypd blue " , but it doesn't quite work out that way .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: however , we do see douglas at work on a few other cases throughout the running time .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: lee grant ( virtually unrecognizable ) plays a meek jewish woman arrested for shoplifting .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: her scenes with bendix , another detective , provide the movie with a few laughs .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the performances all around are fantastic .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: douglas may be the leader of this ensemble , but he's not the center of attention all the time .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: we get to catch a glimpse into other cases and other detectives working on those cases .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: which brings me back to douglas .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he has a really emotional scene towards the end of the picture that really makes you feel for him .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: we can see that this is a man who has spent his whole life trying to eliminate crime , but has finally realized that what he's really done is gotten back at his criminal father .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: how he handles coming to terms with this is something really worth seeing .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: kirk douglas is the kind of actor we don't seem to see to much of these days : he's a tough guy , but the human elements are never hidden too deeply underneath that gruff exterior .
docs.label: positive
